events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a collision involving their vehicle on the highway on April 28th.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial incident description.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned to handle the investigation promptly.
Customer received formal acknowledgment of their auto accident claim from the insurer.
Request sent to customer for photos of the car damage, police report, and medical bills.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident report and repair estimates.
Investigation commenced with review of submitted documents and contacting involved parties.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and extent of car damages from the collision.
Settlement offer proposed to customer covering repair costs and medical expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the process.
Claim formally approved based on agreement of settlement terms and verified documentation.
Payment was issued to customer promptly to cover vehicle repairs and medical bills.
Auto accident claim officially closed after payment issuance and customer confirmation.
All claim records and documentation archived securely in compliance with regulations.
